name: nucampsite
description: This is a website for the fictional campsites review site NuCamp.

scripts.usemin: usemin page2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/page2.html && usemin page4.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/page4.html && usemin page3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/page3.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin

author: Keri Carpenter <kericarpenter@gmail.com>
